item.title: What Is Self Control? | HOMEGIRL
item.description: Podcast Description Happy Sunday! In this episode we talked about self control. It’s hard to control your emotions and behaviors… How do you control yourself? Let us know! ヤッホー、今回のエピソードでは自尊心について話したよー！自分

item.description: Podcast Description Happy Sunday! In this episode we talked about Girl Math♡ It’s so hard to understand about girls for guys, right? How do guys think about that! Let us know what you guys think! やっほー、今回のエピソードではGirl Mathについて話したよ

item.title: Do You Have a Winter boo?! | HOMEGIRL

item.title: How Much Do You Trust Your Boyfriend? | HOMEGIRL
item.description: Podcast Description Happy Sunday! In this episode, we talked about trust issues in relationship! Do you trust your partner 100%?? It’s difficult to trust ppl completely, right? What do you guys think! Let us know♡ やっほー、今回のポッドキャストでは恋愛においての信頼関係

item.title: Red Flags in Guys | HOMEGIRL

item.description: Podcast Description hey guys! today we answer a question from a girl who’s had an experience with a guy abroad and she doesn’t know if she is being ghosted by him because he wasn’t being as responsive as before.. do you only believe in relationships or do you also believe temporary flings are okay? let

item.title: Ex-Boyfriend Horror Stories | HOMEGIRL
item.description: Podcast Description Hi guys! Welcome back to another episode with Meg and Hina! In this episode, we talked about Ex-Boyfriend Horror Stories! We also talked about our halloween spooky episode too! やっほー！今回のエピソードでは元彼の怖いエピソードについて話したよ！もうすぐハ

item.title: When He Has a Girl Best Friend… | HOMEGIRL
item.description: Podcast Description Hi guys! Welcome back to our podcast this week! Today we have a letter from a uni student who has a crush💞 Will you give up when he has a girl best friend or a close girl friends? Let us know!♡ やっほー！ 今週は大学生からのお便り

item.title: Fighting Anxiety(part2) | HOMEGIRL
item.description: Podcast Description Welcome back to part2 guys! So in this episode we are talking about anxiety in relationship! Relationship is hard sometimes. How do you deal with it?? 今回は前回のパート２だよ！今回のエピソードでは、人間関係や恋愛の不安やストレスについ

item.title: Fighting Anxiety (part1) | HOMEGIRL
item.description: Podcast Description Hi guys! We are back this week with a new Topic! In this episode we talked about how to deal with Anxiety. I think it’s very important topic to talk about these days, because In Japan, we don’t really express but suppress our emotions and thoughts. How do you guys deal with anxiety??? Let us know too♡ や

item.title: How to Get Your Dream Girl | HOMEGIRL
item.description: Podcast Description Hey guys welcome back to our podcast this week! Today we have a letter from a high schooler in love 💕 We spilled our ultimate secret to getting the girl/guy of your dreams! haha trust me it’s really easy. Let me know what you guys thought about it too! ヤッホー！今週は、男子高校生から

item.title: Flirting On Text | HOMEGIRL
item.description: Podcast Description Hi guys! Welcome back to another episode with Meg and Hina! In this episode, we talked about flirting on text! Do you like flirted on text? Or, do you hate it?🤣 What do you think? Let us know! やっほー！今回のエピソードではイチャイチャについて話し

item.title: Disneyland Date?! | HOMEGIRL
item.description: Podcast Description Happy Sunday! What do you guys think of going on a first date to Disney land?? Is it just me, or do you prefer quieter, more grown-up dates as you get older? 😳 Going to Disney is fun with friends, isn't it? 😆 What do you guys think? Let us know too💗 やっほー！みんな初デートに

item.title: Can You Say Sorry? | HOMEGIRL

item.title: What’s Our MBTI?! | HOMEGIRL
item.description: Podcast Description Hi guys! In this episode, we talked about MBTI! Today, we have a jam-packed episode filled with MBTI talk! Share your MBTI with us too! Also, What MBTI boyfriend do you want?❤️ やっほー！今回のポッドキャストではMBTIについて話したよ😆

item.title: Temporary Boyfriend Only For Winter?! | HOMEGIRL
item.description: Podcast Description Happy Sunday! It's getting cold guys!!! Since it's getting cold, it's making me want someone! Do you guys feel the same way too? 🤣Also, do you guys agree to make a winter boo? Let us know what you guys think! やっほー！最近寒くなってきたねー! 寒くなるにつ

item.title: Meg Went On A Date!? Part 2 | HOMEGIRL

item.title: Meg Went On A Date!? Part 1 | HOMEGIRL

item.title: Turns Out He Had A Girlfriend...?! | HOMEGIRL
item.description: Podcast Description Happy Sunday! In today's episode, we answered a question from our listener - she was hanging out with a guy, and turns out he had a girlfriend. What would you do? We also talked about our Friday nights in Tokyo! We also posted our night out clubbing on TikTok so make sure to check that out too :) 今日のポッドキャスト

item.title: What If You Hate Your Boyfriend's Friends? | HOMEGIRL

item.title: Cheating Or Not Cheating? | HOMEGIRL
item.description: Podcast Description Hi guys! It’s been so long since our last podcast but we are back with another interesting topic! Have you guys ever thought that your partner is cheating on you? Or maybe felt like it? Sometimes you need to trust them but, what is your reference for cheating? ヤッホー、みんな！前回のポッドキャ

item.title: Are You In A Toxic Relationship? | HOMEGIRL
item.description: Podcast Description Hi guys! In today's podcast, we talk about what it's like to be in a toxic relationship. What's scary is that when you're in one you don't really realize that you are. We talk about some of the experiences both that we went through and some of our friend's experiences. 今日のポッドキャストでは依存した関係

item.title: Things We Love About Boys | HOMEGIRL
item.description: Podcast Description Hey guys! We have a new episode about things we love about boys!! We kinda dreamed about a perfect guy and the action he would do♡ And we also talked about something that boys do that will turn girls off! Boys take notes and girls if you share your opinion in the comments!!;) ヤッホー、みんな！今回のポ

item.title: Speaking Up in Japan | HOMEGIRL
item.description: Podcast Description Welcome back to another episode with Meg and Hina! In this episode, we talked about the globalization of Japan. As much as we're happy with all the tourists visiting Japan, it's also important for us to continue speaking about our cultural backgrounds right? Let us know what you think!! 今週は、日本の文化とかマナーをどうやっ

item.title: Who Do You Trust? | HOMEGIRL
item.description: Podcast Description Hi guys! In today's talk we talked about “who do you trust”. Have you ever thought of the number of people you can actually trust and talk anything about? こんにちは！今日のお話では、「信用できる人は誰？」ついて話し

item.title: Secrets Our Parents Don't Know | HOMEGIRL
item.description: Podcast Description Hi guys! This week we did a truth or truth session in the studio! What's your biggest insecurity? What's your biggest insecurity? We asked each other some juicy questions and answered them all! Let me know what you guys think, or any other requests you have for our podcast topic! やっほー！今週は久々スタジオで録音し

item.title: Trips With Your Boyfriend 101 | HOMEGIRL
item.description: Podcast Description When is it ever NOT exciting to go on a trip with your boyfriend? Planning on what to eat, where to go, where to stay, just thinking about it is so fun! At the same time, we need to spill the tea of what to *really* prepare for the trip right? 彼とお泊まりデート!?好きな人と旅

item.title: What will you be other than what you are doing now? (part2) | HOMEGIRL
item.description: Podcast Description Hi guys! This is part 2 and we talked about 「what you will be other than that you are doing now?」 Do you guys have a dream job or anything you wan to try? I hope after listening to this episode you guys can really go catch your dream! ALWAYS REMEMBER, NEVER LET ANYONE STOP YOU FROM WHAT YOU WANT

item.title: Would you find your love based on your mbti? (part 1) | HOMEGIRL
item.description: Podcast Description Hi guys! In today's podcast, we are going to be talking about MBTI (Meyers-Briggs Type Indicator). Do you think based on a test you can find your true love ? What is your opinion? Also, this episode will have a part 2 so take a guess what we will be talking about next time! Listen to it carefully :) こんにちは！今日の

item.title: When Did You Find Out About Sex? | HOMEGIRL
item.description: Podcast Description Hi guys! In today's podcast, we answered a question from a girl who asked us if she should be in a relationship with a guy she's not that interested in, but because she hasn't been in one for a while. What would you do in that situation? In the latter, we talked about when we learned about the concept of sex. We talked about who we heard it

item.title: Social Media Is Fake | HOMEGIRL
item.description: Podcast Description Happy Sunday guys! In today's episode, we talked about something a little different. Following the recent news of Ryuchell, we talk about the scary side of social media and how to keep yourself from being sucked into the negative side of it. Let us know your thoughts! 今日のポッドキャストではいつもの恋愛の話と

item.title: What Ghosting Really Is... | HOMEGIRL
item.description: Podcast Description Thank you for coming back to our podcast:) This week we talked about what it means to ghost someone or to be ghosted by someone! We all hate that feeling and yet we still do it to others... haha Let us know what you think!! 今週はGhostingについて話したよ！いい感

item.title: Beige Flags!? | HOMEGIRL
item.description: Podcast Description Welcome back to our podcast this week:) There's a phrase going viral on TikTok right now... "Beige Flag". It's an ick you get from your partner but it's not too big of a deal that you mention it. We talked about some of the examples we saw on TikTok and some we came up with. Let me know your beige flags!!! やっほー！今週

item.title: Is This A Sign That He Likes Me? | HOMEGIRL
item.description: Podcast Description Happy Sunday! In today's episode, we answer a question from a girl who's been texting this guy from work. Is it a sign that he likes you if he keeps texting you every day? In the latter half, we talk about what we seek in relationships. 今日のポッドキャストでは高３女子からのお便り

item.title: About Our Backgrounds | HOMEGIRL
item.description: Podcast Description Hi guys！ Welcome back to our podcast this week! Today we talked about our backgrounds and about the company we started this June! やっほー！ 今日は私たちの生い立ちと二人で始めた会社について話したよ🤍 このポッドキャ

item.title: How To Approach A Guy In Class | HOMEGIRL
item.description: Podcast Description Welcome back to our podcast this week! We will be talking about some ways to start talking to a guy you're interested in! We talked about Uni settings specifically because that's a totally different world compared to middle and high school right? Our biggest advice to you guys tho, in general, is to just do whatever you think of doing so that you won't regret anything!!!! 今週

item.title: Love Or Career? | HOMEGIRL
item.description: Podcast Description Happy Sunday! In today's episode, we answered a question from a girl who's confused if she's in love with her childhood friend. Feelings are complicated and sometimes you don't know what you want. In the latter half, we talk about love vs. career. It's not that we can't have both at the same time, but honestly, it's difficult to juggle both - so which one do you prioritize

item.title: Can You Date A Guy Who Shows A Lot Of Affection? | HOMEGIRL
item.description: Podcast Description Hi guys! In this episode, we talked about whether we can date with boys who shows a lot of affection! 今週は愛情表現たっぷりな彼氏と付き合えるかについて話したよ！🤍 みんなはツンデレ彼氏とデレデレ彼氏

item.title: Is Money Important in a Relationship??? | HOMEGIRL
item.description: Podcast Description Welcome back to our podcast this week:) This week we read a letter from a girl asking about her boyfriend's savings. Do you worry if your partner had no savings or does money really not matter when there is love?? Let me know what you guys think!! 今週は恋愛においてお金って大事？っていうト

item.title: Do Guys Like Being Called Cute? | HOMEGIRL
item.description: Podcast Description Welcome back to our podcast! This week, we got a letter from a guy asking what girls mean when they call guys "cute"? There are so many meanings behind that word but it's always a compliment, right? What do you guys think? Also, it's not really common to compliment someone in our daily lives in Japan, but let's make that a trend cause compliments make everyone happy! ヤ

item.title: Red Flags On Instagram | HOMEGIRL
item.description: Podcast Description Happy Sunday! Today we answered a question we got from a girl who has a crush and her friend who also happened to like the same guy... What would you do in that situation? We also talked about the red and green flags that we find on Instagram. What would you do when he's following a ton of influencers? How do you want his explore page to look?

item.title: Can You Date A Younger Guy? | HOMEGIRL
item.description: Podcast Description Hi guys! In today's episode, we answered a question we received a from a guy who's interested in an older girl. From an older girl's perspective, can you date someone who's younger than you? We talk about what we think and how we feel towards dating younger guys. Let me know what you guys think! We're also waiting for you guys to ask us questions! やっほ

item.title: How To Get What You Want | HOMEGIRL
item.description: Podcast Description Hi guys! In this episode, we talk about how emotional pain feels bigger than physical pain... I'm sure you guys have felt that before too! We also talk about how we stay confident in ourselves and how we keep striving for our goals in life. We tell you the secret! Let us know if this is something you would try out :) やっほー！今

item.title: Don't Date A Guy If..... | HOMEGIRL
item.description: Podcast Description Hey guys! Thank you for coming back to our podcast this week! We're back with another episode about relationships... Have you guys ever noticed a red flag in a guy or a girl before you even start dating them?? Knowing the red flags is gonna help you so much from unnecessary problems. Or from your heart being played... If there's any other red flag you know, let us

item.title: Red Flags In A One Night Stand | HOMEGIRL
item.description: Podcast Description Hey guys! In this episode, we talk about flirting with guys at the club, one night stands, and red flags. There are red flags in guys, but they're a bit different when they come to relationships vs one night stands. Let us know if you have any to share with us! Also! Always waiting for your questions if you have any :) 今日のポッド

item.title: Sex Before Dating | HOMEGIRL
item.description: Podcast Description Hey guys! We're back with another relationship episode! So sorry we haven't been able to post for a while.... This week we talk about having sex with someone before dating them. Physical chemistry is important, but is it necessary to find that out before getting into a relationship with them? みんなヤッホー！先週は急遽お休みもら

item.title: Liking a Guy With a Girlfriend | HOMEGIRL
item.description: Podcast Description Happy Sunday guys! Have you guys ever experienced liking someone who's already in a relationship? Apparently, that's a worldwide thing where they someone seems more attractive once they're in a relationship. Weird right? Is there even a term for that? 彼氏・彼女がいる人の方がなんかちょっと魅力的に見えるあの

item.title: Things I Wish I Knew Before Dating | HOMEGIRL
item.description: Podcast Description Hey guys! Happy Wednesday! Recently, we made it to the Top 100 on Japan Podcast on Spotify! Thank you guys so much for listening to our podcast every week it means so much to us!!! This week we talked about some of the things we wish we knew before dating someone. It's so easy to be blind when you're in love, right? We shared some of the things

item.title: Relationship This or That?💖 | HOMEGIRL
item.description: Podcast Description Happy Sunday! In this episode, we did another round of this and that!! We’re filming in an actual studio this week and we’re so happy about the audio quality!!! 今週は久しぶりに恋愛・究極の2択！をやったよ💖付き合うならどっ

item.title: I Fall In Love Too Quickly... | HOMEGIRL
item.description: Podcast Description Happy Wednesday guys! Today we're back with another question from one of our gals! She says she falls in love too quickly when she finds a guy she vibes with... which we totally feel, been there and done that. lol We also talk about what it means to vibe with someone. How do you know he's the one? It differs amongst people, but we talk about what it

item.title: I Don't Want My Boyfriend To Restrict Me! | HOMEGIRL
item.description: Podcast Description Have you ever experienced guilt for doing something just because you're in a relationship? As much as being in a relationship is a choice and no one is restricting you from doing something you want, there are these unspoken rules you must follow when you're in a relationship right? We talked about that in-depth this week and I wanna know what you guys think! 付き合っ

item.title: I Like Him, But I Can't Date Him | HOMEGIRL
item.description: Podcast Description Happy Wednesday! In today's episode, we talk about our experiences in liking a guy, but why we couldn't get into a relationship with them. Relationships aren't that easy, don't you think? Seems kinda serious, but it's a funny episode so we hope you like it!! :) Always waiting for your questions in the google form in our bio! 今日のエピソードでは

item.title: You Have a Boyfriend but a Guy Asks You Out... | HOMEGIRL
item.description: Podcast Description Hi guys! Sorry for the late upload! Today we announced the big news that we've been keeping from you guys for a while! In this episode, we got a question from a girl who studies abroad in Australia. She's in a difficult situation, but a common situation I think we've all been in before. We also talk about a situation where you have a boyfriend, but meet a

item.title: From a Friendship to a Relationship | HOMEGIRL
item.description: Podcast Description Do you guys think you can start a relationship with your friend? In our opinion, we love that! I think we can show our true colors with our friends and isn't it amazing if that person can also be your lover!? Let me know what you guys think! 【友達から恋愛に発展】あり？なし？そもそ

item.title: How do Guys Get Girls in Clubs? | HOMEGIRL
item.description: Podcast Description Hey guys! In this episode, we talk about hookup culture. Since we've traveled to many places as well as lived abroad, we found that the clubbing scene and hookup culture is a bit different from Japan. We spill the tea on how to get into a club for free and our experiences with meeting guys in clubs in Europe! クラブで会う男子の

item.title: Do I Like Him Romantically or Just As Friends? | HOMEGIRL
item.description: Podcast Description Do you guys ever wonder if you like a person romantically or just as friends? Staying in a certain friend group and becoming close to a specific person over time can probably make you feel that way. But that's the point of living life and enjoying love life right? We also dig deep into a type of relationship where you just hook up casually for a few times and never get into a serious relationship.

item.title: How to Study English: This or That? ✏️ | HOMEGIRL
item.description: Podcast Description Happy Sunday frenz! A lot of us have asked about how we learned English as well as the best ways to study English. We shared what we think are the easiest and fun ways to study English through playing This or That! What do you guys think? Have you tried any of these methods or are there any other ways you recommend studying English? Let us know by

item.title: Liking 2 People At The Same Time!? | HOMEGIRL
item.description: Podcast Description We've all been there, done that, right? I think especially when we were students it was so easy to fall in love with someone. A listener of our podcast bravery sent us a topic request about liking two people at the same time. It's a tough topic to bring it out on the table, but it was such a fun topic to talk about! 同時に好

item.title: 胸きゅんシチュエーション大連発💕 | HOMEGIRL
item.description: Podcast Description 不意に言われる言葉とか仕草が一番キュンキュンするのわかる？しかもそういうこと考えてる時間が一番楽しいよね💕 どの時代も恋が一番難しくて一番

item.title: Unhealthy Friends with Benefits | HOMEGIRL
item.description: Podcast Description Hi friends! Today we got a question from another guy listener who lives in Canada! What does dating mean? How is it different from being in a relationship? We talk about the different aspects of dating and how some friends with benefits can be unhealthy...  ①今日はカナダ在住の男子リスナーからのお便りに

item.title: 浮気じゃないけど、これは嫌！！！ | HOMEGIRL
item.description: Podcast Description 好きな人とか恋人にされて、モヤモヤすること、嫌なことって誰にでもあるよね。 でも付き合ってるわけじゃないし、とか浮気ではないから、とかって

item.title: How to Get Over a Breakup | HOMEGIRL
item.description: Podcast Description Happy Wednesday! Today we got a question from a guy studying abroad in Canada! We've all been heartbroken once I'm sure... In this episode, we talk about how to get over a breakup.  Transcript

item.title: He's Not Cheating on Me, But... | HOMEGIRL
item.description: Podcast Description How's your weekend been? In this episode, we talk about things guys and girls do in a relationship that doesn't technically count as cheating, but things that still can bother you. What's your limit? We discuss a full set of scenarios and talk about how we feel!  Transcript

item.title: 【思わせぶり💗】Does He Like Me or Does He Not!?!? | HOMEGIRL
item.description: Podcast Description Have you guys ever experienced being played by someone you like? Isn't it so annoying how it bothers you but you can't stop thinking about that person... This week we talk about how to play back when someone is playing with you!  Transcript

item.title: Why is She Trying to Make Me Jealous? | HOMEGIRL
item.description: Podcast Description Hi friends!! Jealousy undeniably plays a big role in a relationship... So how do you deal with a jealous partner? We're so excited to receive a question from a guy listener this week! Keep those questions coming guys!   Transcript

item.title: Valentine's Day This or That?💖 | HOMEGIRL
item.description: Podcast Description Happy almost Valentine's Day!!! Do you have someone in mind to spend your Valentine's Day with? If not that totally fun too let's all have a single's chocolate party! We tried something fun this week with a relationship this or that. Let us know which one you guys would rather date. Transcript

item.title: Our Fetishes (NOT sexual) | HOMEGIRL
item.description: Podcast Description Today we talk about fetishes or our フェチ! Fetish has a sexual meaning in English, a bit different from Japanese so it's more so about the physical features and things that guys do that turn us on. It's funny how we like such different things haha. What's yours?  Transcript

item.title: Our Study Abroad Experience | HOMEGIRL
item.description: Podcast Description Did you guys know we used to live in Europe for a year? In that one year, we did so much traveling, partying, studying, shopping, etc. This week we wanted to share our experience with you guys in case you are also thinking of studying abroad or are interested in going somewhere! Transcript

item.title: Your Favorite Kind of Kiss? | HOMEGIRL
item.description: Podcast Description When we think of a good kisser, it's never the kiss itself but what he does during the kiss. I recently watched a film with a perfect kisser as the main character. Watch it if you're interested! PG18 tho, haha. Transcript

item.title: Where Do You Feel Sexual Tension? | HOMEGIRL
item.description: Podcast Description Happy Sunday! Today we talk about places that naturally create sexual tension... haha How do you initiate a kiss in the movie theatre? We talk about our personal experiences in this laid back episode! Let us know if you have any questions about love and relationships in the google form linked in our bio!  Transcript

item.title: I Don't Want a Boyfriend But... | HOMEGIRL
item.description: Podcast Description Have you guys ever heard of the word "situationship"?? Apparently, it's a thing nowadays for people who are not ready to be in a relationship but still want someone by their side. It's a new concept but we're intrigued. In this episode, we go talk about this so-called situationship. Enjoy! Transcript

item.title: Fighting With Your Boyfriend? | HOMEGIRL
item.description: Podcast Description Happy Sunday! Today we talk about how to deal with arguments in a relationship. It can be hard, but it's always best to talk it out whether it be with your partner, friend, or family member! Let's all work towards maintaining healthy relationships :) Transcript

item.title: My Guy Best Friend got a Girlfriend... | HOMEGIRL
item.description: Podcast Description Hey guys! Today we talk about when your close friend gets in a relationship... Things definitely start to change... Especially when it's a guy best friend. We talk about how you should handle a difficult situation like this! Transcript

item.title: Is Your Boyfriend Cheating on You? | HOMEGIRL
item.description: Podcast Description Hi guys! In this episode, we talk about cheating... How do you find out if your boyfriend is cheating on you? What would you do if you saw your friend's boyfriend cheating on her? A serious topic but a funny episode!  Transcript

item.title: Girls are So Annoying! | HOMEGIRL
item.description: Podcast Description Hey guys! We're back with another episode answering one of your questions! Thank you to everyone sending us your questions :) Always waiting for more! Link in Bio!  Transcript

item.title: Can You Get Out of the Friendzone? | HOMEGIRL
item.description: Podcast Description Ever experienced liking your guy friend before? I think we've all been there and done that. In this week's episode, we talk about how to get out of that friend zone and make your guy friend like you back! Hope this works and let us know if it does!!! Transcript

item.title: New Year New Me New Goals! | HOMEGIRL
item.description: Podcast Description Happy New Year guys!!! Thank you so much for listening to our podcast last year! So much has happened but thank you for staying by our side and always supporting us. Another year has greeted us and we are riding on this new wave with you guys! Which we're very excited about. One thing I want to achieve this year is for us to find more ways to

item.title: What We Learned in 2022 | HOMEGIRL
item.description: Podcast Description It's the last episode of this year! We talk about lessons that we learned this year that we want to take with us next year :) Thank you guys so much for your endless support... means the world to us <3 See you next year!!  Transcript

item.title: Do I Love Him or Am I Just Attached? | HOMEGIRL
item.description: Podcast Description Merry Christmas!!! A pretty serious topic on Christmas day but hope we can be of help to you guys. Let us know if you're listening to this on Christmas day :) Transcript

item.title: How to Know if a Guy Likes You Over Text | HOMEGIRL
item.description: Podcast Description Texting plays a big role in when we're trying to get to know each other...but it's difficult to know if he likes you or not through text. Does he or does he not? In this episode, we talk about different text scenarios that are likely to happen with your crush.  Transcript

item.title: Worried about your future? | HOMEGIRL
item.description: Podcast Description We're all worried about our future. Relationships with friends, lovers, and family can worry us too, but many of our worries come from work. Not knowing what you want to do in the future, not knowing what kind of occupation you want, and worrying if your path is correct. I know these things can worry you, it worries us too. But we are in this together! We are also worried too but it's okay there's always a way!

item.title: Relationship This or That? 💔 | HOMEGIRL
item.description: Podcast Description We're back with another round of this or that questions with Meg and Hina! The questions were quite tough but a fun conversation to have with your friends! Let us know what your answers are :) Transcript

item.title: How to Make a Guy Like You | HOMEGIRL
item.description: Podcast Description Everyone wants to know the secret... So how do you actually make someone like you? In this episode, we talk about how to push and pull to make the one fall for you!  Transcript

item.title: Having High Expectations.... | HOMEGIRL
item.description: Podcast Description Are we not able to find a boyfriend because we haven't met the right person yet? Or is it because our expectations are too high? Transcript

item.title: Can a Japanese girl date an American guy? | HOMEGIRL
item.description: Podcast Description Thank you guys so much for asking us questions via our link! We'll be doing this every week so if you have anything on your mind or just wanna chat, make sure to fill in the google form on our profile :)  Transcript

item.title: How to Flirt with a Guy 101 | HOMEGIRL
Caring about what others think... | HOMEGIRL
item.description: Podcast Description We all have those days when we just can't take it any more right? Feeling judged, or looked down upon, stuff like that. We go through that too every day and still haven't found the cure. But talking about it will probably make us feel a little better! We're all in this together let's do this guys! Transcript

item.title: Does he like me or does he not? | HOMEGIRL
item.description: Podcast Description A question we've all wondered at least once in our life... Is he giving me a sign or am I overthinking? We explored situations both on text and in person. Transcript

item.title: Turn Off in a Guy!?!? | HOMEGIRL
item.description: Podcast Description Things that make us loose feelings for a guy. Hahah but tbh I don't think we're that picky!!! Or are we.... Listen to find out and let us know!!! Transcript

item.title: Our Ideal First Date!!! | HOMEGIRL
item.description: Podcast Description Tell us your ideal first date!!! So many ideas and debates for a sing date in this episode hahaha. Hope you enjoy our episode this week! Transcript

item.title: Love Psychology Test ❤️ | HOMEGIRL
item.description: Podcast Description In this episode, we play a psychology test on love and relationships. Make sure you think of your own answers while listening! Or play with your friends!! :) Transcript

item.title: 追いたい派？追われたい派？【English】 | HOMEGIRL
item.description: Podcast Description Hey guys we're back with another episode talking about love & relationships. Which one are you? We talk more personally about ourselves this week!  Transcript

item.title: Girl Talk: Sex, 20 Exes, Cheating | HOMEGIRL
item.description: Podcast Description Let's do some girl talk today. What do you look for in a person when you consider dating them?? Lots of things to think about and consider right? haha Transcript

item.title: Top 10 Halloween Netflix🎃 | HOMEGIRL
item.description: Podcast Description Spooky season is back! Are you guys excited about Halloween? Party with friends, chill at home, any scene needs a little spook to spice up the vibe right? Here are our top 10 recommended Netflix shows and films we want you to try! xoxo Transcript

item.title: Red Flags in Girls | HOMEGIRL
item.description: Podcast Description So sorry we haven't been uploading for two weeks straight! We were super busy... But we are back with an amazing announcement!!! We talked about things to look out for in guys last time, so this time we talked about girls. Girls should be a team!! Girlpower!! Not bring others down.... right?? Transcript

item.title: You're ugly... | HOMEGIRL
item.description: Podcast Description No one likes negative energy... Today we talk about how both of us have experienced hate comments on our social media platforms. This episode is for you if you have toxic people around you! Transcript

item.title: Dating A Guy Before You Like Him | HOMEGIRL
item.description: Podcast Description Back with an English podcast this week :) Dating culture can be super different amongst countries... How do you like to play the dating game? Transcript

item.title: 【Spill the Tea】リスナーのみんなと暴露大会🤫💕 | HOMEGIRL
item.description: Podcast Description 今週は久しぶりに日本語で録ったよ！ インスタで募集したみんなの暴露話をここでマル秘公開❤️もちろん匿名で！笑 好評だったらまたやるから感想D

item.title: Relationship This or That? | HOMEGIRL
item.description: Podcast Description 恋愛Q＆A究極の２択！今日はスペシャルゲストきたよ💝 If you had to choose between the two, which would you choose? Did it both in Japanese and English. Kind of haha. Enjoy guys xxx Transcript

item.title: Red Flags in Guys | HOMEGIRL
item.description: Podcast Description What are some red flags in guys??? Some of the things are super low-key but it's so important to talk about it! Maybe we'll do a girl version soon. xxx Transcript

item.title: Is Money Important in a Relationship? | HOMEGIRL
item.description: Podcast Description What do you guys think?? As we grow older, we can't help but consider the importance of money when we go into a relationship... Love conquers all but then again being in a relationship costs money ya know? This week we talked specifically about how money affects relationships! Transcript

item.title: Weed in America!? | HOMEGIRL
item.description: Podcast Description We came back to Japan from Chicago! Lollapalooza was so much fun! Thanks to Snapchat for sponsoring us and thank you guys for always following our socials! xxx Transcript

item.title: Can Boys and Girls be Just Friends? | HOMEGIRL
item.description: Podcast Description Today we talk about a common topic - many people seem to have different opinions, but we talk about our beliefs and dive further into interesting scenarios... let us know if you've experienced any of the situations that we talk about in this episode! Transcript

item.title: We're going to one of the biggest festivals in America! | HOMEGIRL
item.description: Podcast Description We're so excited to announce that we'll be going to Lollapalooza this year!! Let us know which artists you want to see and we'll be posting everything on Snapchat!  Transcript

item.title: Jealous? or Not? | HOMEGIRL
item.description: Podcast Description Welcome back to our podcast this week! We all get jealous once in a while right? We talked about some of the common situations in relationships, and discussed rather or not that makes us jealous. lol  What did you guys think? Are we crazy or are we normal? haha Transcript

item.title: Balancing Your Friendship with Your Love Life | HOMEGIRL
item.description: Podcast Description Honestly, this is one of the hottest topics of all time. Looking back, there are many good memories but also many that I'd go back and redo. lol Anyways, this week is us just having a girl talk about relationships n all 💖 Transcript

item.title: He's a 10 but.... | HOMEGIRL
item.description: Podcast Description He's got the looks, personality, and everything but... What are the things you can give in and cannot? Let us know what you think! Transcript

item.title: Is it worth travelling right now? | HOMEGIRL
item.description: Podcast Description Honestly, there's so much more preparation that you have to do before, during, and after when travelling right now. In this episode, we talk about if it's really worth all of our time and money to travel! Transcript

item.title: What we think about people who lie🤫 | HOMEGIRL
item.description: Podcast Description To be honest, we've all lied before, right? we have to. and there are many ways to look at lies. is it good? is it bad? we answered that question for you guys xxx Transcript

item.title: How we keep our bodies in shape | HOMEGIRL
item.description: Podcast Description Honestly, our bodies are not in shape..... LOL but we strive for a healthy body! and if that's what you're looking for, this podcast is for you! Transcript

item.title: メグひな、韓国へ行く！？🇰🇷 | HOMEGIRL
item.description: Podcast Description Hey guyssssss! Podcastを聞いてくれてる子にいち早く報告！ 前回行きたい国をストーリーで聞いて、回答が多かった国に行くことにしたよ！ Transcript

item.description: Podcast Description Have you guys ever been through a breakup? We certainly have!!!!! Here are some tips on how to get past a breakup and start living a positive happy life again💖 It's so much fun to be in love, right? xxx Transcript
